articles.title: Marcos eyes stronger ties with South American countries - Manila Bulletin
articles.content:
President Ferdinand “Bongbong” Marcos Jr. is eyeing stronger ties with several countries in South America.
During a meeting with several ambassadors to the Philippines on Sept. 27, Marcos expressed … [+1442 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Dziedzic, Marian Faa
articles.title: Draft US-Pacific declaration shows diplomatic wrangling over security, climate change - ABC News
articles.description: A draft joint declaration being negotiated by the United States and Pacific Island countries outlines intensifying American security cooperation with the region and declares climate change is the "greatest existential threat" to the Pacific.
articles.content: A draft joint declaration being negotiated by the United States and Pacific Island countries condemns Russia's invasion of Ukraine, flags intensifying American security cooperation with the region an… [+4996 chars]
